name: Bumper Blades
description:
This game was made for the  Disc Room Game Jam with all code and assets being created over the two week jam. It is also a spiritual successor to our other game Spinout so check that out HERE if you enjoy this one!

CONTROLS

This game supports up to two local players using either a keyboard or gamepad. We would recommend to try using a gamepad if you struggle using the keyboard controls.

Gamepad (Preferred )Left Stick: Steer and Throttle
Right Bumper: Charge Smash AttackPlayer1 KeyboardUp and Down arrow keys: Throttle and Reverse: 
Left and Right arrow keys: Steer
Space: Charge Smash AttackPlayer2 Keyboard
W and S keys: Throttle and Reverse: 
A and D keys: Steer
Left Shift: Charge Smash Attack Things to come

As of right now we have a couple of things we want to add to the game in a post-jam update. Some of these things will include new enemy types as well as some stage hazards and general balancing. Follow this project to get an email when the update is released!
